p.s: I received your sonnet and I'm happy to be the addresseaddressee.
First of all I have to say that for me it was hard to understand your words and the meaning of them.
I hope I understood your intention.
When I haven't please say so.
I think do you want to express with your sonnet how time is passing by and we miss the good things while concentrating on the negative.
I agree that people miss out the most important while worrying about negative times.
That is something which has not changed during the 400 years between us.
It shows me that you have the talent to look into people's souls and to express people's feelings best.
Your knowledge about human feedings is impressive.
You catch you every feeling precisely.
Even though your time is over you still influence us today.
Not only the words and phrases who invented which we still use also the fact that everyone can interpret your sonnets and play for themselves.
That shows how big your understanding of the human soul really is and how right you are.
I hope I got your intention right and if not I hope you understand what I want to say and maybe you can even agree with me even if it is not what you wanted to say.
The world would miss something without your plays and sonnets,
